description: Mr. Mime wandered into Delia Ketchum`s house when Delia was expected Ash to return home in a Mr. Mime costume. Delia orginally thought Mr. Mime was her son in the costume and made it dinner. Mr. Mime enjoyed the dinner so much that it became fast friends with Delia and decided to help her by doing the household chores.
name: Barrierd (Hanako)
